title: VILLAGE / LILIENNES TWINS
description: You can talk to them before and get nothing, but when you hear the twins have been to the island they tell you details about it.

dialogueTree.title: Lilienne's Twin: "The scruffy-haired little boy kicks..."
dialogueTree.text: The scruffy-haired little boy kicks a stone while the other watches him do it.

links.title: You: ""Real quick, boys -- where were you..."
links.text: "Real quick, boys -- where were you when you heard the voices?"

links.title: Lilienne's Twin: ""There." The boy points toward one..."
links.text: "There." The boy points toward one of the ruined monoliths nearby.

links.title: Lilienne's Other Twin: ""We were there." The other child no..."
links.text: "We were there." The other child nods. The Feld building looms overhead.

links.title: You: ""Hah! I knew it!""
links.text: "Hah! I knew it!"

links.title: Lilienne's Twin: ""Uh-huh!" one says, throwing a rock..."
links.text: "Uh-huh!" one says, throwing a rock into the sand.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Full circle." The lieutenant smile..."
links.text: "Full circle." The lieutenant smiles to himself. "Back to Feld, then. When you're ready."

links.title: Lilienne's Other Twin: "The boy turns the rock over in his..."
links.text: The boy turns the rock over in his hands. He looks to you, then his brother, then back to you.

links.title: You: ""Thanks, kids.""
links.text: "Thanks, kids."

links.title: You: ""And so I return to thee, Feld.""
links.text: "And so I return to thee, Feld."

links.title: You: ""Okay kids, tell Kim here what happ..."
links.text: "Okay kids, tell Kim here what happened with the voices."

links.title: Lilienne's Other Twin: ""The one we heard say a bad word?"..."
links.text: "The one we heard say a bad word?" The boy shrugs. "Okay. The voices were like..." He scratches his head -- then seems to remember.

links.title: Lilienne's Twin: ""'It is time at last, my nasty spee..."
links.text: "'It is time at last, my nasty speedfreaks! Our brotherman is about to grow up!'"

links.title: Lilienne's Other Twin: ""'DJ Flacio's big boy debut single..."
links.text: "'DJ Flacio's big boy debut single is here! Buckle up, because this is the fastest trash that you're ever gonna hear.'"

links.title: Lilienne's Twin: ""'Turn up the volume, blow those sp..."
links.text: "'Turn up the volume, blow those speakers out. Now here's---'"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I understand." The lieutenant's ey..."
links.text: "I understand." The lieutenant's eyes are wide in surprise, despite his calm voice. "Thank you. Let's have a word when you're finished, detective."

links.title: Lilienne's Other Twin: "The boy picks up a rock. Then anoth..."
links.text: The boy picks up a rock. Then another. He looks at you and blinks.

links.title: You: ""Hey, boys. Your sister told me you..."
links.text: "Hey, boys. Your sister told me you got in trouble for saying bad words."

links.title: Lilienne's Twin: ""Yeah." The boy turns a rock over i..."
links.text: "Yeah." The boy turns a rock over in his hand. "We heard *bad* words and said them, and got in trouble..."

links.title: Lilienne's Other Twin: ""Bad words," the other says, noddin..."
links.text: "Bad words," the other says, nodding absent-mindedly. "Bad, bad words..."

links.title: Electrochemistry: "Say *fuck.* It'd be HILARIOUS."
links.text: Say *fuck.* It'd be HILARIOUS.

links.title: Horrific Necktie: "It would be hilarious, my man! Live..."
links.text: It would be hilarious, my man! Live it up! Say *FUCK!*

links.title: Composure: "Conduct yourself with some dignity...."
links.text: Conduct yourself with some dignity. You don't need to swear in front of the children.

links.title: Logic: "Wait! Stop everything. Back this up..."
links.text: Wait! Stop everything. Back this up. What are *bad words*?

links.title: Authority: "Pipe down Puzzle Face, this is a Co..."
links.text: Pipe down Puzzle Face, this is a Code Red situation! If we review all the *bad words*, that's only going to add more temptation to saying them -- in front of the *children*. And we *do not* want that.

links.title: You: ""Fuck.""
links.text: "Fuck."

links.title: Volition: "This is a shame and a disappointmen..."
links.text: This is a shame and a disappointment.

links.title: Lilienne's Other Twin: "The boy blinks. "Fffff...." Despite..."
links.text: The boy blinks. "Fffff...." Despite his efforts, the unfamiliar word catches in his mouth.

links.title: Electrochemistry: "COME ON BOYS, YOU CAN DO IT!"
links.text: COME ON BOYS, YOU CAN DO IT!

links.title: Lilienne's Other Twin: ""Ff..." The other boy tries. He loo..."
links.text: "Ff..." The other boy tries. He looks at his brother for understanding, then at you. "What does that mean?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Nothing. What happened? Where'd yo..."
links.text: "Nothing. What happened? Where'd you hear bad words? Was it from someone on the coast? The radio?"

links.title: Empathy: "The lieutenant is deeply unimpresse..."
links.text: The lieutenant is deeply unimpressed.

links.title: Electrochemistry: "Why does he have to be such a binoc..."
links.text: Why does he have to be such a binoclard? It's just a funny word!

links.title: Empathy: "The boys seem less happy now."
links.text: The boys seem less happy now.

links.title: Lilienne's Other Twin: ""We didn't hear that word. We heard..."
links.text: "We didn't hear that word. We heard other bad words..."

links.title: You: ""It's a bad word. The worst word.""
links.text: "It's a bad word. The worst word."

links.title: Lilienne's Twin: ""Oh..." The boy looks uncomfortable..."
links.text: "Oh..." The boy looks uncomfortable, at the jetty toward his mother.

links.title: Electrochemistry: "Preach it, brother! Spread the good..."
links.text: Preach it, brother! Spread the good word *fuck* all over town!

links.title: You: ""It's a mystery. You'll have to fin..."
links.text: "It's a mystery. You'll have to find out yourselves."

links.title: Lilienne's Twin: ""Oh..." The boy looks uncomfortable..."
links.text: "Oh..." The boy looks uncomfortable, at the jetty toward his mother.

links.title: Lilienne's Other Twin: ""We didn't hear that word. We heard..."
links.text: "We didn't hear that word. We heard other bad words..."

links.title: You: ""Bad words? What bourgeois mentalit..."
links.text: "Bad words? What bourgeois mentality, to deem certain *working class words* bad."

links.title: Lilienne's Other Twin: ""Bou... what?" The boy gently tosse..."
links.text: "Bou... what?" The boy gently tosses his rock at the rock tower, and misses. "Was that a bad word?"

links.title: You: ""Bourgeois? Yes. One of the worst,..."
links.text: "Bourgeois? Yes. One of the worst, child."

links.title: Lilienne's Twin: ""Don't say more bad words!" The boy..."
links.text: "Don't say more bad words!" The boy frowns.

links.title: You: ""Nah. I just thought it was funny t..."
links.text: "Nah. I just thought it was funny to say."

links.title: Lilienne's Other Twin: "don't know why it's funny..." The b..."
links.text: don't know why it's funny..." The boy frowns.

links.title: You: ""Bad words are bad. Don't say them,..."
links.text: "Bad words are bad. Don't say them, kids. It's a first step to a life of crime."

links.title: Lilienne's Other Twin: ""We won't," the little boy says. He..."
links.text: "We won't," the little boy says. He adjusts his cap in the cool air.

links.title: Lilienne's Twin: ""We learned," the other replies."
links.text: "We learned," the other replies.

links.title: Volition: "Good on you. I know you were tempte..."
links.text: Good on you. I know you were tempted to shout *fuck*, but you controlled your impulse. Well done.

links.title: You: ""Let's move on. Where did you hear..."
links.text: "Let's move on. Where did you hear the bad words -- was it from someone on the coast? The radio?"

links.title: You: ""Okay. What happened?""
links.text: "Okay. What happened?"

links.title: Lilienne's Other Twin: ""We just heard funny voices." The b..."
links.text: "We just heard funny voices." The boy shrugs. His jacket whispers as his shoulders move.

links.title: Lilienne's Twin: ""We thought the voices were funny."..."
links.text: "We thought the voices were funny." The brother nods. "We said what they said and then we got in trouble..."

links.title: You: ""Where did you hear them? Did you o..."
links.text: "Where did you hear them? Did you overhear someone say them? Was it on the radio?"

links.title: Lilienne's Twin: ""Radio? What's that?" The boy sniff..."
links.text: "Radio? What's that?" The boy sniffs up a drip of snot. "We just heard them. In our head."

links.title: Conceptualization: "Could it be? Do their minds work in..."
links.text: Could it be? Do their minds work in the same way?

links.title: Inland Empire: "Voices from another self? Voices fr..."
links.text: Voices from another self? Voices from *a deeper self*?  Voices from... *early schizophrenia*?

links.title: You: ""Voices in your head? Like little b..."
links.text: "Voices in your head? Like little bleeps and bloops of information?"

links.title: Lilienne's Other Twin: ""No." The boy shakes his head. "Jus..."
links.text: "No." The boy shakes his head. "Just people talking real fast."

links.title: You: ""Okay. What did you hear?""
links.text: "Okay. What did you hear?"

links.title: Lilienne's Twin: ""Uh..." He scratches his head. He l..."
links.text: "Uh..." He scratches his head. He looks at his twin, who nods -- and then he begins. "It was like... 'It is time at last, my nasty speedfreaks! Our brotherman is about to grow up!'"

links.title: Reaction Speed: "A memory stirs. You've heard this q..."
links.text: A memory stirs. You've heard this quickfire patter before.

links.title: Lilienne's Other Twin: ""'DJ Flacio's big boy debut single..."
links.text: "'DJ Flacio's big boy debut single is here! Buckle up, because this is the fastest trash that you're ever gonna hear.'"

links.title: Lilienne's Twin: ""'Turn up the volume, blow those sp..."
links.text: "'Turn up the volume, blow those speakers out. Now here's---'"

links.title: Lilienne's Other Twin: ""No!" The brother cuts in, suddenly..."
links.text: "No!" The brother cuts in, suddenly and sharply. "Don't say bad words, stupid!"

links.title: Drama: "Why, what a splendid rendition thes..."
links.text: Why, what a splendid rendition these two rapsssssssssscallions have offered us here today! Faultless memorization! Perchance they'll enjoy greatness as a double-act in the Performing Artsss.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""A word when you're done." The lieu..."
links.text: "A word when you're done." The lieutenant clears his throat. His eyes are wider than usual.

links.title: Lilienne's Twin: "The boy draws a jagged rock across..."
links.text: The boy draws a jagged rock across the ground. It leaves a white scratch.

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "Elsewhere in Revachol, the Lieutena..."
links.text: Elsewhere in Revachol, the Lieutenant switches on the radio. His head rocks subtly to a violent track. He needs to hear this story.

links.title: You: ""Any family history of schizophreni..."
links.text: "Any family history of schizophrenia?"

links.title: Lilienne's Other Twin: ""Is that a bad word?" The boy blink..."
links.text: "Is that a bad word?" The boy blinks at you.

links.title: You: ""No. Just tell me what you heard.""
links.text: "No. Just tell me what you heard."

links.title: You: ""Sure. But what words did you hear?""
links.text: "Sure. But what words did you hear?"

links.title: You: ""'Fuck' is the bad word, remember?..."
links.text: "'Fuck' is the bad word, remember? But tell me what you heard."

links.title: You: ""What do you mean you 'heard them i..."
links.text: "What do you mean you 'heard them in your head'?"

links.title: Lilienne's Other Twin: ""You know." He points at his head...."
links.text: "You know." He points at his head. His fingers are red from the cold. "I heard people talking. Except just in my head!"

links.title: You: ""Kids, has anything *strange* happe..."
links.text: "Kids, has anything *strange* happened lately?"

links.title: Lilienne's Twin: ""Uhm..." The boy turns a rock over..."
links.text: "Uhm..." The boy turns a rock over in his hand. "We heard *bad* words and said them, and got in trouble..."

links.title: You: ""Okay kids. You've been to that isl..."
links.text: "Okay kids. You've been to that island, right?"

links.title: Lilienne's Twin: ""On that island?" The one who's bus..."
links.text: "On that island?" The one who's busy kicking his stone points to the bay.

links.title: You: ""Yes, that one. I need to know what..."
links.text: "Yes, that one. I need to know what's there."

links.title: Lilienne's Twin: ""That's... uhm... nothing?" The boy..."
links.text: "That's... uhm... nothing?" The boy pauses to think with his finger in his mouth. "It's just a seafort and some plants. You can take a raft there. It's great."

links.title: Lilienne's Other Twin: ""And! And!" the other one butts in...."
links.text: "And! And!" the other one butts in. "We make a fire. We make a... we make a fire."

links.title: Lilienne's Twin: ""Mhm," his brother nods. "Gather th..."
links.text: "Mhm," his brother nods. "Gather the sticks for the fire -- and bullets. Or not real bullets, empty bullets."

links.title: Logic: "Bullet shells? There are a lot of t..."
links.text: Bullet shells? There are a lot of them left over from the war -- but this could be important.

links.title: You: ""Wait, you mean *shells*?""
links.text: "Wait, you mean *shells*?"

links.title: Lilienne's Twin: ""I don't know what those are...""
links.text: "I don't know what those are..."

links.title: You: ""What then?""
links.text: "What then?"

links.title: Lilienne's Twin: ""There are lights. The fire guy com..."
links.text: "There are lights. The fire guy comes and asks us to put the fire out."

links.title: Reaction Speed: "Your nerve endings *sting* from the..."
links.text: Your nerve endings *sting* from the mention of a *guy*.

links.title: Rhetoric: "They must mean a human being. On th..."
links.text: They must mean a human being. On that island? But it's cut off...

links.title: You: ""Someone lives on the island?""
links.text: "Someone lives on the island?"

links.title: Lilienne's Twin: ""No," the boy answers, shaking his..."
links.text: "No," the boy answers, shaking his head vehemently.

links.title: Lilienne's Other Twin: ""Yes." His brother looks at him, th..."
links.text: "Yes." His brother looks at him, then at you.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Let's go with *yes*." The lieutena..."
links.text: "Let's go with *yes*." The lieutenant raises his eyebrows and whips out his notebook.

links.title: You: ""Why is he the *fire* guy?""
links.text: "Why is he the *fire* guy?"

links.title: Lilienne's Twin: ""Because.... because..." The boy pa..."
links.text: "Because.... because..." The boy pauses to think.

links.title: Lilienne's Other Twin: ""Because he asks to put the fire ou..."
links.text: "Because he asks to put the fire out!" the other explains.

links.title: You: ""Why does he ask you to put the fir..."
links.text: "Why does he ask you to put the fire out?"

links.title: Lilienne's Twin: ""Uhm... I don't know. He doesn't li..."
links.text: "Uhm... I don't know. He doesn't like it. He doesn't like people to be there. You shouldn't go."

links.title: Lilienne's Other Twin: ""Yes," the other one adds laconical..."
links.text: "Yes," the other one adds laconically, standing with his hands glued to his sides like a little tin soldier.

links.title: Savoir Faire: "Because he doesn't want to be found..."
links.text: Because he doesn't want to be found. Smoke traces...

links.title: Half Light: "A suspicious request. Made out of f..."
links.text: A suspicious request. Made out of fear?

links.title: You: ""You mentioned something about *lig..."
links.text: "You mentioned something about *lights*?"

links.title: Lilienne's Twin: ""I..." starts one of them -- it's h..."
links.text: "I..." starts one of them -- it's hard to tell which one now. "I don't know."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Did you mean there are *electrical..."
links.text: "Did you mean there are *electrical* lights?" He points to the streetlight.

links.title: Lilienne's Twin: ""Uhm... yes." The boy looks at his..."
links.text: "Uhm... yes." The boy looks at his toes.

links.title: You: ""Is there anything else you can tel..."
links.text: "Is there anything else you can tell me about this *guy*? Age? Does he live there?"

links.title: Lilienne's Twin: ""No, he doesn't live there. I don't..."
links.text: "No, he doesn't live there. I don't think."

links.title: Lilienne's Other Twin: ""No, he lives there." The other nod..."
links.text: "No, he lives there." The other nods. "He's been there twice, two times."

links.title: Lilienne's Twin: ""Huh..." The first one pauses to th..."
links.text: "Huh..." The first one pauses to think, then comes to some kind of conclusion. "He doesn't live there. He isn't there sometimes."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Anything else? What does this guy..."
links.text: "Anything else? What does this guy look like?"

links.title: Lilienne's Twin: ""I don't know," they say almost in..."
links.text: "I don't know," they say almost in unison.

links.title: You: ""How come?""
links.text: "How come?"

links.title: Lilienne's Other Twin: ""We... we ran. He just yelled we sh..."
links.text: "We... we ran. He just yelled we shouldn't be there."

links.title: You: ""Anything else? What does this guy..."
links.text: "Anything else? What does this guy look like?"

links.title: You: ""Your father used to go to that isl..."
links.text: "Your father used to go to that island too, didn't he?"

links.title: Lilienne's Twin: ""Our father killed himself.""
links.text: "Our father killed himself."

links.title: Lilienne's Other Twin: ""Don't say that. He didn't." His br..."
links.text: "Don't say that. He didn't." His brother punches him. The boy's eyes well up like he's about to start crying.

links.title: Pain Threshold: "A dull pain flashes through your mi..."
links.text: A dull pain flashes through your mind.

links.title: You: ""It's okay to kill yourself, you kn..."
links.text: "It's okay to kill yourself, you know. I'm gonna blow my brains out. Gonna close this one final case and then *blam* -- I'm outta here."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Shut up." The lieutenant jabs you..."
links.text: "Shut up." The lieutenant jabs you in the ribs with his elbow, then turns to the boy...

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Don't punch your brother.... pleas..."
links.text: "Don't punch your brother.... please. Don't start crying. We still need to ask more questions."

links.title: Lilienne's Twin: ""I'm not gonna start *crying*," the..."
links.text: "I'm not gonna start *crying*," the one who almost started crying snaps, regaining control of his quivering chin.

links.title: Lilienne's Twin: ""Please don't..." The boy's eyes we..."
links.text: "Please don't..." The boy's eyes well up as he looks at you. They're dark and round. The wind tussles his hair.

links.title: Lilienne's Other Twin: ""Don't start *crying*," his brother..."
links.text: "Don't start *crying*," his brother says, then, in a whisper, adds: "I'm sorry."

links.title: Lilienne's Twin: "The other boy straightens his back...."
links.text: The other boy straightens his back. "I'm not gonna start *crying*, stupid," he snaps, regaining control of his quivering chin.

links.title: You: ""Your father did not kill himself.""
links.text: "Your father did not kill himself."

links.title: Lilienne's Twin: ""I don't know..." The boy who made..."
links.text: "I don't know..." The boy who made the claim finds himself unsure of it. He looks around.

links.title: Lilienne's Other Twin: "The other watches him, brows knitte..."
links.text: The other watches him, brows knitted. "It doesn't even have anything to do with this, you. Father isn't the fire guy."

links.title: Logic: "The two things are *unconnected*. Y..."
links.text: The two things are *unconnected*. Your question didn't make sense.

links.title: You: ""He killed himself all right.""
links.text: "He killed himself all right."

links.title: You: "Say nothing."
links.text: Say nothing.

links.title: Lilienne's Twin: ""I'm sorry." The one says to the ot..."
links.text: "I'm sorry." The one says to the other, rubbing his brother's shoulder affectionately.

links.title: You: ""Is that all you know? Is there any..."
links.text: "Is that all you know? Is there anything more you can tell me about the island?" (Conclude.)

links.title: Lilienne's Twin: ""There's a..." the boy says, rubbin..."
links.text: "There's a..." the boy says, rubbing his eyes. It's clear that he has no intention of finishing the sentence.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Lights? Fire guy?" The lieutenant..."
links.text: "Lights? Fire guy?" The lieutenant looks at you. "We should check up on that island and you..."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "He whispers: "You need to keep your..."
links.text: He whispers: "You need to keep your *dark humour* in check in front of children, okay?"

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "I'm not telling you twice."
links.text: I'm not telling you twice.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Lights? Fire guy?" The lieutenant..."
links.text: "Lights? Fire guy?" The lieutenant looks at you. "We should check up on that island."

links.title: You: ""Mhm." (Nod in agreement.)"
links.text: "Mhm." (Nod in agreement.)

links.title: You: ""No, some other island. *Of course*..."
links.text: "No, some other island. *Of course* that one."

links.title: Lilienne's Other Twin: ""Okay." His brother answers for him..."
links.text: "Okay." His brother answers for him.

links.title: You: ""I need you to tell me what you kno..."
links.text: "I need you to tell me what you know about it -- what's *on* the island?"

links.title: You: ""I heard you kids sometimes play in..."
links.text: "I heard you kids sometimes play in the abandoned Feld building?"

links.title: Lilienne's Twin: ""What's a Feld building?" one of th..."
links.text: "What's a Feld building?" one of the twins asks with a shrug.

links.title: Lilienne's Other Twin: ""Nah, we don't go anywhere, nah," t..."
links.text: "Nah, we don't go anywhere, nah," the other mumbles.

links.title: Lilienne's Twin: ""I dunno what you're talking about...."
links.text: "I dunno what you're talking about." The boy stuffs his hands deep into his pockets and kicks another rock.

links.title: Lilienne's Other Twin: ""He dunno what you're talking about..."
links.text: "He dunno what you're talking about." The other nods.

links.title: You: ""Do *you* know what I'm talking abo..."
links.text: "Do *you* know what I'm talking about?"

links.title: Lilienne's Twin: ""He dunno what you're talking about..."
links.text: "He dunno what you're talking about," the first kid says loudly. Or you think it's the first kid -- it could be the second.

links.title: Lilienne's Other Twin: ""I dunno what you're talking about,..."
links.text: "I dunno what you're talking about," the other kid nods along.

links.title: You: ""You're not helping me..""
links.text: "You're not helping me.."

links.title: Lilienne's Twin: ""Ha ha, I dunno what you're talking..."
links.text: "Ha ha, I dunno what you're talking about." One of the boys shrugs his shoulders and starts laughing.

links.title: Perception (Hearing): "It's a purposefully shrill laugh. L..."
links.text: It's a purposefully shrill laugh. Like he's practised it for the express purpose of annoying people.

links.title: Conceptualization: "Are there actually two of them? Are..."
links.text: Are there actually two of them? Are you sure you're not just hallucinating or seeing double?

links.title: You: ""Bye." [Leave.]"
links.text: "Bye." [Leave.]

links.title: You: ""Bye." [Leave.]"
links.text: "Bye." [Leave.]

links.title: You: ""Kids, have you seen any bad people..."
links.text: "Kids, have you seen any bad people around?"

links.title: Lilienne's Twin: ""What bad people?" One of the twins..."
links.text: "What bad people?" One of the twins looks up, his mouth slightly open.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I don't think questioning four-yea..."
links.text: "I don't think questioning four-year-olds without their parents present is gonna crack the case," says the lieutenant.

links.title: Authority: "Then we're *definitely* doing it."
links.text: Then we're *definitely* doing it.

links.title: You: ""Bad people. Criminals. Dangerous w..."
links.text: "Bad people. Criminals. Dangerous women."

links.title: Lilienne's Other Twin: ""No, we're not really supposed to t..."
links.text: "No, we're not really supposed to talk to strangers, you know." The other twin shakes his head.

links.title: You: ""Hey, where is your mom?""
links.text: "Hey, where is your mom?"

links.title: Lilienne's Twin: "The kids don't reply, absorbed in t..."
links.text: The kids don't reply, absorbed in their little game.

links.title: You: ""You must be Lilienne's twins.""
links.text: "You must be Lilienne's twins."

links.title: Lilienne's Twin: ""Mhm. Lily's our mom," says one of..."
links.text: "Mhm. Lily's our mom," says one of the twins.

links.title: Lilienne's Twin: "This one doesn't say anything, kick..."
links.text: This one doesn't say anything, kicking the concrete with his worn-out sneaker.

links.title: Lilienne's Other Twin: ""Lily's our mom," explains the othe..."
links.text: "Lily's our mom," explains the other one, tongue still lolling out of his mouth.

links.title: You: ""I already said that.""
links.text: "I already said that."

links.title: Lilienne's Twin: "The stone-kicker laughs suddenly. H..."
links.text: The stone-kicker laughs suddenly. His head is too large for his shoulders.

links.title: Lilienne's Other Twin: "The other one laughs as well."
links.text: The other one laughs as well.

links.title: Inland Empire: "Maybe there's some kind of reason w..."
links.text: Maybe there's some kind of reason why they're laughing? An interesting reason somehow tied to the case!

links.title: You: ""What are you laughing about?""
links.text: "What are you laughing about?"

links.title: Lilienne's Twin: "The boy stops laughing and looks at..."
links.text: The boy stops laughing and looks at his toes.

links.title: Half Light: "Oh, okay. So now he's *shy*. Now he..."
links.text: Oh, okay. So now he's *shy*. Now he's not talking, just wobbling around like he's afraid of something.

links.title: Logic: "You will never get an answer. That'..."
links.text: You will never get an answer. That's how it is with these little idiots.

links.title: You: "I don't care."
links.text: I don't care.

links.title: Lilienne's Twin: "The boy keeps laughing. Then he bow..."
links.text: The boy keeps laughing. Then he bows down to inspect the rock as though there's something noteworthy about it.

links.title: Logic: "Wow, so intellectually stimulating."
links.text: Wow, so intellectually stimulating.

links.title: Physical Instrument: "The stone-kicking isn't even of ver..."
links.text: The stone-kicking isn't even of very high calibre. Anyone can do that.

links.title: You: ""Bye." [Leave.]"
links.text: "Bye." [Leave.]

links.title: You: ""Is little Lily your sister?" (Poin..."
links.text: "Is little Lily your sister?" (Point to the house.)

links.title: Lilienne's Twin: ""Yes.""
links.text: "Yes."

links.title: You: ""Yes?""
links.text: "Yes?"

links.title: Lilienne's Twin: ""Yes.""
links.text: "Yes."

links.title: You: ""That's it? You're being laconic ab..."
links.text: "That's it? You're being laconic about it?"

links.title: Lilienne's Twin: "It doesn't look like he knows what..."
links.text: It doesn't look like he knows what that means.

links.title: You: ""Okay.""
links.text: "Okay."

links.title: Lilienne's Twin: ""Yes.""
links.text: "Yes."

links.title: You: ""You guys look identical.""
links.text: "You guys look identical."

links.title: Lilienne's Twin: "One of the boys nods, the other one..."
links.text: One of the boys nods, the other one looks at his brother and shrugs.

links.title: Lilienne's Twin: "The stone-kicking one becomes frant..."
links.text: The stone-kicking one becomes frantic all of a sudden, as if that's something to be scared of -- the obvious fact that you just stated.

links.title: Lilienne's Other Twin: ""He looks just like me," the other..."
links.text: "He looks just like me," the other one says.

links.title: You: ""Yeah, I said that.""
links.text: "Yeah, I said that."

links.title: Lilienne's Other Twin: "The boy doesn't answer. His brother..."
links.text: The boy doesn't answer. His brother throws another rock. Both of their hair is covered in some kind of dirt.

links.title: Composure: "The rock-kicker was just being *shy..."
links.text: The rock-kicker was just being *shy*, but now he's enthusiastic again.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""You're bad with kids," the lieuten..."
links.text: "You're bad with kids," the lieutenant remarks with evident glee.

links.title: You: ""I am, yes.""
links.text: "I am, yes."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Don't worry, everyone is." He look..."
links.text: "Don't worry, everyone is." He looks at the little scruffian, then at you. "How about we do some police work now? We're not getting anything here."

links.title: You: ""And what are you, Kid Master Gener..."
links.text: "And what are you, Kid Master General?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Maybe I am?" He grins. "Now, how a..."
links.text: "Maybe I am?" He grins. "Now, how about some actual police work? We're not getting anything here."

links.title: You: ""It's impossible to be *good* with..."
links.text: "It's impossible to be *good* with kids, they're too stupid."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""You're right there." He looks at t..."
links.text: "You're right there." He looks at the little scruffian, then at you. "Let's see if we can find some police work, shall we? We're not getting anything here."

links.title: You: ""Bye." [Leave.]"
links.text: "Bye." [Leave.]

links.title: You: ""Children are stupid.""
links.text: "Children are stupid."

links.title: Lilienne's Twin: ""Maybe *you're* stupid!""
links.text: "Maybe *you're* stupid!"

links.title: Lilienne's Other Twin: ""Don't say that, he's a *po-leees o..."
links.text: "Don't say that, he's a *po-leees oooffi-ser*," his brother whispers.

links.title: Lilienne's Twin: ""Ha-ha," the scruffy-haired little..."
links.text: "Ha-ha," the scruffy-haired little kid laughs, as though in agreement.

links.title: Lilienne's Other Twin: ""You're stupid," the other one tell..."
links.text: "You're stupid," the other one tells him, suddenly very serious.

links.title: You: ""Okay, how about the policeman asks..."
links.text: "Okay, how about the policeman asks you something else now?"

links.title: Lilienne's Twin: ""Okay." The scruffy-haired boy squi..."
links.text: "Okay." The scruffy-haired boy squints up at you.

links.title: You: ""I'm just gonna leave now. I'm gonn..."
links.text: "I'm just gonna leave now. I'm gonna leave and not talk to you anymore." [Leave.]

links.title: Lilienne's Twin: "Just a second ago, the first one wa..."
links.text: Just a second ago, the first one was laughing. Now he's doing something with his lip and his gap tooth.

links.title: Empathy: "It looks like he's *sad*. Because y..."
links.text: It looks like he's *sad*. Because you're going or... who knows, really?

links.title: Logic: "There's no *system* to this."
links.text: There's no *system* to this.

links.title: You: ""You're being *random*!""
links.text: "You're being *random*!"

links.title: Lilienne's Twin: ""You're stupid," the other one repe..."
links.text: "You're stupid," the other one repeats, still deathly serious.

links.title: Rhetoric: "The secrets of understanding the to..."
links.text: The secrets of understanding the tongues of children have been lost to you a long time ago.

links.title: You: ""Bye." [Leave.]"
links.text: "Bye." [Leave.]

links.title: You: ""Bye." [Leave.]"
links.text: "Bye." [Leave.]

links.title: You: ""Bye kids, take care." [Leave.]"
links.text: "Bye kids, take care." [Leave.]

dialogueTree.title: Lilienne's Twin: "The scruffy-haired little boy kicks..."
dialogueTree.text: The scruffy-haired little boy kicks a stone. He can't be more than five years old.

links.title: Lilienne's Other Twin: "The other one looks indistinguishab..."
links.text: The other one looks indistinguishable from him. He watches his brother kick the stone with his tongue lolling out of his mouth.
